name: A Flatter World
description:
A Game by wentbinary and Hidden Bea(s)t

[DESCRIPTION]

Crashed in a weird planet, way out of shape and laws, where one side is bright, dry and extremely hot and the other, dark, humid and really cold, you must survive while finding parts to fix your ship and leave.

A Flatter World is a small 2D adventure "strategish" game made as the entry for the Beginners Circle Jam #3, where the objective is to fix the spaceship that you crash landed onto a weird flat planet while you manage your survival resources. There is a small sun and moon orbiting this planet on opposite sides, and when it gets too hot you can... Go to the opposite side of the planet to cool down a bit, where there are also things lurking in the dark...

It probably has some rookie mistakes but we would like to polish it further with all your feedback and make it into quite the entertaining small HTML game.

[INSTRUCTIONS]

The game can be played with the mouse only, there is a tutorial, enabled by default when you play. It can be disabled at any time on the main menu.
